 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַוָּה‎</span> **proper name, feminine** (***life***, see [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[Gen.3.20|Gen 3:20]] &gt; [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Prol. 1886, 322; Skizzen iii. 217</sup> after [[BDB#Nö|Nö]] who suggests ***serpent*** as possible meaning, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; but [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 177</sup> 'mother of every <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***µayy***</u></abbr>,' see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַי‎</span> below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חיה‎</span>) — [[Gen.3.20|Gen 3:20]] ***and the man called his wife*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַוָּ֑ה‎</span>, because she was <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵם כָּלחָֽֿי׃‎</span>; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִשְׁתּוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[Gen.4.1|Gen 4:1]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]). — II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַוָּה‎</span> ***village***, see below below II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוה‎</span>.
